DOC.brief_summary: The specific objective study compare relative efficacy combination temporary iridium implant plus external beam irradiation versus standard external beam irradiation alone patient Stage B2 C prostatic carcinoma . Benefit assessed term local recurrence , survival , toxicity .
DOC.brief_title: Radical Radiotherapy External Beam Radiation Versus Radical Radiotherapy With Temporary Iridium Implant Plus External Beam Radiation Carcinoma Prostate
DOC.criteria: All patient must histologically prove adenocarcinoma prostate The primary tumour stag clinically B2 C classify A.J.C . Staging System Patients require transurethral prostatectomy ( TURP ) prior diagnosis Presence metastasis identify bone scan , chest xray CT scan abdomen pelvis , stag lymphadenectomy Karnofsky performance status le 80 Inadequate laboratory result : i.e . Hb < 12 gm/litre , WBC < 3.5 x 10 per litre , platelet < 100 x 10/litre , urea > 13 mmol/litre , creatinine > 220 mmol/litre Unfit surgery medical reason Age 75 year Failure provide write informed consent
